001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.validator;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionTarget;
004
005/**
006 * Defines assertion targets for database query validation.
007 *
008 * <p>This enum categorizes different aspects of a database query result that can be validated,
009 * ensuring structured assertions for database testing.
010 *
011 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate ğŸ’ğŸ‘¨ğŸ’»
012 */
013public enum DbAssertionTarget implements AssertionTarget<DbAssertionTarget> {
014
015   /**
016    * Validates the query result content.
017    */
018   QUERY_RESULT,
019
020   /**
021    * Validates the number of rows returned by the query.
022    */
023   NUMBER_ROWS,
024
025   /**
026    * Validates the column structure of the result set.
027    */
028   COLUMNS;
029
030   /**
031    * Retrieves the specific assertion target.
032    *
033    * @return The enum representing the assertion target.
034    */
035   @Override
036   public DbAssertionTarget target() {
037      return this;
038   }
039}
